resources.string: Speak current Voice Password to change your Voice Password.
Tap on MIC to Speak Voice Password\'or\' Click on Keypad icon to unlock with PINCODE
Permission Granted, Now you can set your voice password.
Permission Denied, You cannot set your voice password.
Your Default Voice Password is Hello , \n Alternate password is 1234
Permit Drawing Over Other Apps permission accepted
Permit Drawing Over Other Apps permission Denied
